PA.1: Bodily Injury — no stacking of UM/UIM limits
PA.2: Property Damage — no stacking of UM/UIM limits
PA.3: Bodily Injury and Property Damage — no stacking of UM/UIM limits
PA.4: Bodily Injury — stacked multi-car UM/UIM limits
PA.5: Property Damage — stacked multi-car UM/UIM limits
PA.6: Bodily Injury and Property Damage — stacked multi-car UM/UIM limits
